sentences.sContent: But to do it, Europe should develop its own unified Asia policy, set its own priorities, and learn to have one voice on the euro and European defense strategy.
sentences.sContent_eng: But to do it, Europe should develop its own unified Asia policy, set its own priorities, and learn to have one voice on the euro and European defense strategy.
sentences.sCn: 但是想做到的话，欧洲必须制定其统一的亚洲政策，选择它的优先事务，并学会在欧元和欧洲防御战略上保持统一的声音。

synos.tran: 欧元（欧盟的统一货币单位）

phrases.pCn: n. 欧洲迪斯尼（位于法国巴黎郊外的大型主题公园）
